text: waqal lahum abwhm: ya abnayy 'iidha dakhaltum 'ard "msr" fala tadkhuluu min bab wahd, wlkn adkhuluha min 'abwab mtfrqt, hataa la tsybkm aleyn, wa'iiniy 'iidh awsykm bhdha la adfe eankum shyyana qdah allah elykm, fama alhukm 'iilaa lilah whdh, ealayh aietamadat wwthqt, waealayh wahdah yaetamid almwmnwn
